text: The Marriage of a Young Stockbroker is a 1971 American romantic comedy drama movie directed by Lawrence Turman and based on novel of the same name by Charles Webb. It stars Richard Benjamin, Joanna Shimkus, Adam West, Elizabeth Ashley and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 comedy-drama movies Category:1971 romantic comedy movies Category:1971 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: The Marriage of a Young Stockbroker
